lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.java.system.types.design

Interface JIntHasServerSideActor

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActProxyAdministrator, ActProxyAuthenticated, ActProxyCoordinator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActProxyAdministratorImpl, ActProxyAuthenticatedImpl, ActProxyComCompanyImpl, ActProxyCoordinatorImpl

    public interface JIntHasServerSideActor
    The Interface HasServerSideActor, means an Actor has an associated server side actor. If the window is closed, we should destroy the connection.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy()
      Destroy will terminate the connection with the server side actor, by removing the associated listener.

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        void destroy()
      throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
             java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Destroy will terminate the connection with the server side actor, by removing the associated listener.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - Thrown if the server has not been bound correctly in the RMI settings
